statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); output="\033[34m${cwd}\033[0m"; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); changes=""; git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks diff --quiet 2>/dev/null && git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null || changes="*"; ahead_behind=""; upstream=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks rev-parse --abbrev-ref @{u} 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$upstream" ]; then ahead=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks rev-list --count @{u}..HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 0); behind=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks rev-list --count HEAD..@{u} 2>/dev/null || echo 0); [ "$behind" -gt 0 ] && ahead_behind="${ahead_behind}â‡£"; [ "$ahead" -gt 0 ] && ahead_behind="${ahead_behind}â‡¡"; fi; output="${output} \033[90m${branch}${changes}\033[0m"; [ -n "$ahead_behind" ] && output="${output} \033[36m${ahead_behind}\033[0m"; fi; output="${output} \033[90m[${model}]\033[0m"; printf "%b" "$output"
